## PreviousNextPagingComponent.renderItemsPerPageText() method

Converts number to text that is going to be rendered for ItemsPerPage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
renderItemsPerPageText(value: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>number</code> | Text to be displayed for items per page |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
